metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP (using REST API)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP](https://prisma.pan.dev/api/cloud/cwpp/audits/#operation/get-audits-incidents) data connector allows you to connect to your Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP instance and ingesting alerts into Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector is built on Microsoft Sentinel’s Codeless Connector Platform and uses the Prisma Cloud API to fetch security events and supports DCR-based [ingestion time transformations](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/logs/custom-logs-overview) that parses the received security event data into a custom columns so that queries don't need to parse it again, thus resulting in better performance.

sampleQueries.description: Get Sample of Prisma Compute Events

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

Read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key)

customs.name: Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP API Key
customs.description: A Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP Monitor API username and password is required. [See the documentation to learn more about Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP SIEM API](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Palo%20Alto%20Prisma%20Cloud%20CWPP/Data%20Connectors/readme.md).

instructionSteps.description:
To enable the Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP Security Events for Microsoft Sentinel, provide the required information below and click on Connect.
>
instructionSteps.title: Connect Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP Security Events to Microsoft Sentinel

columns.name: time
columns.description: The time at which the data was generated

columns.name: hostname
columns.description: Name of the node initiated the alert.

columns.name: cluster
columns.description: Name of the cluster the node belongs

columns.name: imageName
columns.description: Name of the image involved for the alert

columns.name: namespace
columns.description: This is the grouping of the nodes in a cluster.

dataFlows.transformKql:
source 
| project-rename 
 TimeGenerated = ['time'], PrismaId = _id, SerialNumber = serialNum, Acknowledged = acknowledged, Hostname = hostname, FQDN = fqdn, ContainerName = containerName, ContainerID = containerID, ImageName = imageName, ImageID = imageID, ProfileID = profileID, Namespace = namespace, Category = category, ResourceType = type, Audits = audits, Collections = collections, AccountID = accountID, Cluster = cluster

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp (UTC) reflecting the time in which the event was generated.

columns.name: Hostname
columns.description: Name of the node initiated the alert.

columns.name: Cluster
columns.description: Name of the cluster the node belongs

columns.name: ImageName
columns.description: Name of the image involved for the alert

columns.name: Namespace
columns.description: This is the grouping of the nodes in a cluster.

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP solution for Microsoft Sentinel allows you to connect to your Palo Alto Prisma Cloud CWPP instance and ingest alerts into your Microsoft Sentinel workspace using the Prisma Cloud API.

Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:

This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in Preview state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

  1. Codeless Connector Platform (CCP)

Data Connectors: 1

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
